title: Baba's Magic Seeds
hook: Baba planted mysterious seeds in her garden. What will sprout from them? Let's find out!
moral: Kindness can lead to unexpected blessings.
paragraphs: One sunny morning, Baba found a secret pouch of glittering seeds hidden in her garden shed. "Oh, what’s this?" she wondered.
"I'll plant these mysterious seeds and see what grows!" exclaimed Baba with excitement. So she carefully planted them in her flower bed.
Days passed, and Baba watered the seeds every morning with love and care. Soon, tiny colorful sprouts began peeking out of the soil.
"Oh my goodness! These are magic seeds!" Baba gasped in amazement. Each sprout blossomed into flowers that sparkled under the sun.
As the flowers bloomed, Baba noticed the air filled with a sweet, enchanting fragrance that brought joy to everyone in the neighborhood.
"Thank you for sharing these beautiful flowers!" said Baba's neighbors, feeling grateful for the magical gift.
Baba's garden became a wondrous sight, attracting butterflies and bees, spreading happiness all around.

en-de.title: Babas Zaubersamen
en-de.hook: Baba hat geheimnisvolle Samen in ihren Garten gepflanzt. Was wird von ihnen sprießen? Lass es uns herausfinden!
en-de.moral: Freundlichkeit kann zu unerwarteten Segnungen führen.
paragraphs:
An einem sonnigen Morgen fand Baba eine geheime Tasche mit glitzernden Samen, versteckt in ihrem Gartenschuppen. "Oh, was ist das denn?" fragte sie sich.
"Ich werde diese geheimnisvollen Samen pflanzen und sehen, was wächst!" rief Baba aufgeregt aus. Also pflanzte sie sie sorgfältig in ihr Blumenbeet.
Tage vergingen, und Baba hat jeden Morgen die Samen mit Liebe und Sorgfalt gegossen. Bald begannen winzige, bunte Sprossen aus der Erde zu sprießen.
"Oh mein Güte! Das sind Zauberbohnen!" rief Baba erstaunt. Jeder Spross blühte zu Blumen, die unter der Sonne funkelten.
Als die Blumen blühten, bemerkte Baba, dass die Luft mit einem süßen, bezaubernden Duft erfüllt war, der allen in der Nachbarschaft Freude brachte.
"Danke für das Teilen dieser schönen Blumen!" sagten Baba's Nachbarn und fühlten sich dankbar für das magische Geschenk.
Baba's Garten wurde zu einem zauberhaften Anblick, der Schmetterlinge und Bienen anlockte und überall Glück verbreitete.

en-fr.title: Les Graines Magiques de Baba
en-fr.moral: Être gentil peut apporter des surprises merveilleuses.
en-fr.hook: Baba a planté des graines mystérieuses dans son jardin. Qu'est-ce qui va pousser ? Découvrons !
paragraphs:
Un matin ensoleillé, Baba a trouvé une pochette secrète de graines scintillantes cachée dans sa remise de jardin. "Oh, qu'est-ce que c'est?" elle se demandait.
"Je vais planter ces graines mystérieuses et voir ce qui pousse !" s'exclama Baba avec excitation. Alors elle les planta soigneusement dans son parterre de fleurs.
Les jours passèrent, et Baba arrosait les graines chaque matin avec amour et soin. Bientôt, de minuscules pousses colorées ont commencé à pointer hors de la terre.
"Oh la la! Regarde! Ce sont des graines magiques!" Baba s'écria d'émerveillement. Chaque pousse se transforma en fleurs qui scintillaient sous le soleil.
Quand les fleurs ont poussé, Baba a remarqué que l'air était rempli d'un parfum doux et enchanteur qui apporta joie à tous dans le quartier.
"Merci d'avoir partagé ces jolies fleurs !" dirent les voisins de Baba, se sentant reconnaissants pour le cadeau magique.
Le jardin de Baba est devenu un endroit merveilleux, attirant les papillons et les abeilles, apportant du bonheur partout.

en-pt.moral: Ser gentil pode trazer surpresas boas inesperadas.
en-pt.title: As Sementes Mágicas da Vovó
en-pt.hook: Vovó plantou sementes misteriosas no seu jardim. O que vai nascer delas? Vamos descobrir!
paragraphs:
Certa manhã ensolarada, Baba encontrou um bolsinha secreta de sementes brilhantes escondida no seu galpão de jardim. "Oh, o que é isso?" ela se perguntou.
"Vou plantar essas sementes misteriosas e ver o que cresce!" exclamou Baba com empolgação. Então ela as plantou cuidadosamente em seu canteiro de flores.
Os dias passaram, e Baba regou as sementes todas as manhãs com muito amor e carinho. Logo, brotinhos coloridos e pequeninos começaram a surgir da terra.
"Ai, que maravilha! Essas são sementes mágicas!" Baba deu um suspiro de espanto. Cada broto floresceu em flores que brilhavam sob o sol.
Quando as flores desabrocharam, Baba percebeu que o ar estava cheio de um doce e encantador cheiro que trouxe alegria para todos no bairro.
"Obrigado por dividir essas flores lindas!" disseram os vizinhos do Baba, se sentindo felizes pelo presente mágico.
O jardim da Baba ficou muito bonito, atraindo borboletas e abelhas, espalhando felicidade por todos os lados.

id-en.hook: Baba planted mysterious seeds in her garden. What will sprout from them? Let's find out!
id-en.moral: Kindness can lead to unexpected blessings.
id-en.title: Baba's Magic Seeds
paragraphs:
One bright morning, Baba discovered a special bag of shiny seeds hidden in her garden house. "What is this?" she asked herself.
"I'll put these magic seeds in the ground and find out what they become!" cried Mama with joy. So she gently put them in her garden.
Many days went by, and Baba watered the seeds every morning with love and care. Before long, small and colorful baby plants started to appear from the ground.
"Wow! Look at these special seeds!" Grandma said excitedly. Every small plant grew into pretty flowers that shined in the sunlight.
When the colorful flowers opened up, Baba saw the air was very nice and smelled so good that made everyone happy in the area.
"Thank you for sharing these beautiful flowers!" said Baba's neighbors, feeling grateful for the magical gift.
Baba's garden transformed into a magical place, with colorful butterflies and buzzy bees, making everyone happy.
